# Token Reference Table

This table lists all tokens for this component:

| Token | Description |
|-------|------------|
| border.color | Sets the color of the outline around container elements (boxes that hold content). This creates a colored border around the container to define its boundaries.<br>CSS variable: --wm-container-border-color |
| border.width | Controls the thickness of the outline around container elements. When set to 0, there's no visible border. Higher values create thicker borders around the container.<br>CSS variable: --wm-container-border-width |
| border.style | Controls the style of the outline around container elements. 'none' removes the border, 'solid' creates a continuous line, 'dashed' creates a dotted line, 'dotted' creates small dots.<br>CSS variable: --wm-container-border-style |
| border.radius | Controls the corner rounding of container elements. When set to 'none', containers have sharp corners. Higher values create more rounded corners for a softer appearance.<br>CSS variable: --wm-container-border-radius |
| shadow | Controls the drop shadow effect around container elements. This creates a subtle shadow that makes the container appear to float above the background, giving it depth and elevation.<br>CSS variable: --wm-container-shadow |
